Text.Page:
Iron Order members are infiltrating our territory in high numbers recently, and I want to know why.

While we investigate that, though, we can't just let this go unpunished. You're to infiltrate their territory. Take out as many {@linkcreature:123#202#Darkquaver mugatos} and {@linkcreature:123#205#river ghilliedhus} as you can.

They'll need those animals for noctenium research. But we're going to get to them first.
Good job. Keep an eye out, though. You never know what they're planning.
